physical_appearance:This is a photograph of the Shwedagon Pagoda in Rangoon
 Burma. The pagoda is seen in the distance
 in the background of the photograph. In the foreground
 there is a road surrounded by vegetation
 with a lake on the right. There is a horse-drawn carriage in the middle of the road
 with several people accompanying it. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Shwedagon Pagoda in Rangoon, Burma. The pagoda is seen in the distance, in the background of the photograph. In the foreground, there is a road surrounded by vegetation, with a lake on the right. There is a horse-drawn carriage in the middle of the road, with several people accompanying it. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
